import { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Badge } from './ui/badge'; import { Input } from './ui/input'; import { Label } from './ui/label'; import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from './ui/select'; import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle } from './ui/dialog'; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow } from './ui/table'; import { Eye, Filter, AlertTriangle, Download, Camera, Calendar, TrendingUp, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; interface Incident { id: string; weapon_type: string; confidence: number; timestamp: string; date: string; time: string; camera_id: string; camera_name: string; image_url: string; severity: 'critical' | 'high' | 'medium' | 'low'; } const mockIncidents: Incident[] = [ { id: 'INC-001', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.94, timestamp: '2026-02-09 14:32:15', date: '09/02/2026', time: '14:32:15', camera_id: 'CAM-001', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'high' }, { id: 'INC-002', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.87, timestamp: '2026-02-09 13:18:42', date: '09/02/2026', time: '13:18:42', camera_id: 'CAM-005', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento Norte', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'critical' }, { id: 'INC-003', weapon_type: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.76, timestamp: '2026-02-09 12:05:28', date: '09/02/2026', time: '12:05:28', camera_id: 'CAM-012', camera_name: 'Pasillo Norte - Piso 2', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'medium' }, { id: 'INC-004', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.91, timestamp: '2026-02-09 11:44:11', date: '09/02/2026', time: '11:44:11', camera_id: 'CAM-003', camera_name: 'RecepciÃ³n Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'high' }, { id: 'INC-005', weapon_type: 'Objeto Sospechoso', confidence: 0.68, timestamp: '2026-02-09 10:22:33', date: '09/02/2026', time: '10:22:33', camera_id: 'CAM-008', camera_name: 'Salida de Emergencia', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'low' }, { id: 'INC-006', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.82, timestamp: '2026-02-09 09:15:47', date: '09/02/2026', time: '09:15:47', camera_id: 'CAM-001', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'high' }, { id: 'INC-007', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.95, timestamp: '2026-02-09 08:45:22', date: '09/02/2026', time: '08:45:22', camera_id: 'CAM-005', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento Norte', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551836022-d5d88e9218df?w=800', severity: 'critical' }, { id: 'INC-008', weapon_type: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.72, timestamp: '2026-02-09 07:33:10', date: '09/02/2026', time: '07:33:10', camera_id: 'CAM-006', camera_name: 'CafeterÃ­a', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605114967-8130f3a36994?w=800', severity: 'medium' }, { id: 'INC-009', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.88, timestamp: '2026-02-09 06:12:55', date: '09/02/2026', time: '06:12:55', camera_id: 'CAM-003', camera_name: 'RecepciÃ³n Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1486312338219-ce68d2c6f44d?w=800', severity: 'high' }, { id: 'INC-010', weapon_type: 'Objeto Sospechoso', confidence: 0.65, timestamp: '2026-02-09 05:28:40', date: '09/02/2026', time: '05:28:40', camera_id: 'CAM-012', camera_name: 'Pasillo Norte - Piso 2', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1518770660439-4636190af475?w=800', severity: 'low' }, ]; export function Incidents() { const [incidents] = useState(mockIncidents); const [selectedIncident, setSelectedIncident] = useState(null); const [isDetailOpen, setIsDetailOpen] = useState(false); // Filtros const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ dateFrom: '', dateTo: '', weaponType: 'all', minConfidence: '', camera: 'all', severity: 'all' }); const handleViewEvidence = (incident: Incident) => { setSelectedIncident(incident); setIsDetailOpen(true); }; const weaponTypes = Array.from(new Set(mockIncidents.map(i => i.weapon_type))); const cameras = Array.from(new Set(mockIncidents.map(i => ({ id: i.camera_id, name: i.camera_name })))); const filteredIncidents = incidents.filter(incident => { if (filters.weaponType !== 'all' && incident.weapon_type !== filters.weaponType) return false; if (filters.camera !== 'all' && incident.camera_id !== filters.camera) return false; if (filters.severity !== 'all' && incident.severity !== filters.severity) return false; if (filters.minConfidence && incident.confidence < parseFloat(filters.minConfidence)) return false; return true; }); const criticalCount = filteredIncidents.filter(i => i.severity === 'critical').length; const highCount = filteredIncidents.filter(i => i.severity === 'high').length; const mediumCount = filteredIncidents.filter(i => i.severity === 'medium').length; const lowCount = filteredIncidents.filter(i => i.severity === 'low').length; const clearFilters = () => { setFilters({ dateFrom: '', dateTo: '', weaponType: 'all', minConfidence: '', camera: 'all', severity: 'all' }); }; const getSeverityColor = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case 'critical': return { bg: 'bg-rose-100', text: 'text-rose-700', border: 'border-rose-300', icon: 'ðŸ”´', label: 'CrÃ­tica' }; case 'high': return { bg: 'bg-orange-100', text: 'text-orange-700', border: 'border-orange-300', icon: 'ðŸŸ ', label: 'Alta' }; case 'medium': return { bg: 'bg-amber-100', text: 'text-amber-700', border: 'border-amber-300', icon: 'ðŸŸ¡', label: 'Media' }; default: return { bg: 'bg-slate-100', text: 'text-slate-700', border: 'border-slate-300', icon: 'âšª', label: 'Baja' }; } }; return (

setFilters({ ...filters, dateFrom: e.target.value })} className="bg-slate-50 border-slate-300 h-10" />

{incident.weapon_type}
= 0.9 ? 'bg-emerald-500' : incident.confidence >= 0.7 ? 'bg-amber-500' : 'bg-rose-500' }`} style={{ width: `${incident.confidence * 100}%` }} />
= 0.9 ? 'bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-700 border-emerald-300' : incident.confidence >= 0.7 ? 'bg-amber-50 text-amber-700 border-amber-300' : 'bg-rose-50 text-rose-700 border-rose-300' }`} > {(incident.confidence * 100).toFixed(0)}%
